short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CruzChat is your digital TA designed to help you with your homework assignments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CruzChat is an extension designed to assist students at UC Santa Cruz with homework assignments. Students can message CruzChat with questions they have about their homework and be provided with helpful tips and guidence.
